name: Stone Cold Steve Cobblerson
description:
Steve "Stone Cold" Cobblerson had it all.  Wealth, fame, and power. Until two birds took everything he held dear. Hellbent on revenge, Steve sets out on a daredevil mission with his pet rock Robert "Rocky" Balboa to prove you really can kill two birds with one stone.

Aim is to kill two birds with a single throw. Feed Rocky's insatiable urge to kill in order to power him up. Return home to refresh enemies. Press space to level up.

Rated G for garbage.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - To Move

LMB - To Smash

RMB - To Throw

Space - Open Upgrade Window
